class_notes: Course Topic: Debauchery in the Twentieth Century
course_description: An exploration of literary works (fiction, poetry, drama, essays) that have had or have a popular readership, and an examination of the factors governing popular taste and literary production.
sections: Class Nbr: 6466, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: H. Griggs, Status: Open
